## injectStyleSheet variable

Injects given CSS string as global stylesheet in DOM head. If `first` is true, inserts it as first stylesheet, else (default) appends it.

Returns created style DOM element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
injectStyleSheet: (css: string, first?: boolean) => HTMLStyleElement
```
